businessSummary.oneLiner: Southeast Asia's largest e-commerce (Shopee), digital entertainment (Garena/Free Fire), and fintech (Monee) operator ‚Äî a Singapore-based global internet company.
businessSummary.description: Sea Limited is a global technology company headquartered in Singapore, operating three core businesses across Southeast Asia, Latin America, Taiwan, and beyond: e-commerce (Shopee), gaming (Garena), and digital financial services (Monee, formerly SeaMoney). On a TTM basis through 2025, revenue reached $21.04B (+35.8% YoY) with net income of $1.42B, completing a full profitability turnaround. On February 19, 2026, Sea expanded its strategic AI partnership MOU with Google, driving AI innovation across e-commerce, gaming, and fintech. The Q4 2025 earnings report is scheduled for March 3.
howTheyMakeMoney: Shopee: E-commerce platform commissions, advertising revenue, logistics (SPX Express) fees ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $3.8B (+36.6% YoY)
Garena: In-game virtual item sales from Free Fire and other titles, plus publishing revenue ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $653M (+31.2% YoY), bookings $775M (+51% YoY)
Monee (formerly SeaMoney): Digital payments (ShopeePay), consumer/SME lending (SPayLater), digital banking (SeaBank), insurance ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $990M (+60.8% YoY)
keyProducts: Shopee ‚Äî #1 e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Latin America (48% market share)
Garena Free Fire ‚Äî Global mobile battle royale game (Q3 2025 bookings +51% YoY)
Monee/ShopeePay ‚Äî Digital payment and financial services platform (loan book $7.9B, +70% YoY)
SeaBank ‚Äî Digital banking in Indonesia and the Philippines

keyMetrics.name: P/E Ratio (TTM)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Based on TTM EPS of $2.29. Reasonable for a high-growth internet company, though elevated in absolute terms.

keyMetrics.name: Forward P/E (FY2026E)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Based on consensus EPS of $4.25 (FY2026E). PEG of 0.45 makes the valuation attractive relative to the growth rate.

keyMetrics.name: Revenue Growth (YoY)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Shopee +36.6%, Monee +60.8%, Garena +31.2%. All three segments growing at 30%+.

keyMetrics.name: Operating Margin
keyMetrics.interpretation: Significantly improved from FY2024's 3.94%. Scale economies and logistics internalization benefits are taking effect.

keyMetrics.name: Free Cash Flow
keyMetrics.interpretation: FCF margin 18.5%. Nine-month cumulative FCF of $4.6B (+80% YoY).

keyMetrics.name: Debt-to-Equity
keyMetrics.interpretation: Net cash of $5.66B (~$9.56 per share). Very healthy balance sheet.

keyMetrics.name: ROE / ROIC
keyMetrics.interpretation: Improving rapidly since the profitability turnaround. Net income $1.42B (+1,358% YoY).

growthDrivers.title: Shopee's e-commerce dominance and accelerating monetization
growthDrivers.description: Maintaining #1 position in Southeast Asia with 48% market share. Q3 2025 GMV of $32.2B (+28% YoY) marked a fifth consecutive all-time high. Ad revenue grew +70% YoY, with SPX Express logistics internalization driving efficiency. Southeast Asia e-commerce GMV is projected to reach $230B in 2026.

growthDrivers.title: Google AI strategic partnership ‚Äî full AI transformation across Shopee, Garena, and Monee
growthDrivers.description: Signed an expanded MOU with Google on February 19, 2026. Shopee: Gemini-powered agentic shopping prototype. Garena: AI-driven game development innovation. Monee: Agent Payments Protocol (AP2) adoption.

growthDrivers.title: Monee (fintech) hyper-growth ‚Äî leading Southeast Asian digital finance
growthDrivers.description: Q3 2025 revenue +60.8% YoY, loan book $7.9B (+70% YoY), 90-day NPL ratio stable at 1.1%. Active lending users surpassed 28M. Addressing Southeast Asia's 450M unbanked population.

growthDrivers.title: Garena/Free Fire bookings rebound ‚Äî IP collaboration strategy pays off
growthDrivers.description: Q3 2025 bookings of $775M (+51% YoY) marked the best quarter since 2021. IP collaborations with Squid Game, Naruto, and others improved bookings per user by 40%.

competitiveAdvantage.summary: The integrated ecosystem spanning Southeast Asian e-commerce, gaming, and fintech is the core competitive advantage. Cross-synergies between Shopee, Monee, and Garena, plus the proprietary logistics network (SPX Express), form significant barriers to entry.

moats.description: Shopee's two-sided buyer-seller network and the SPX Express logistics network create powerful network effects. 48% market share in Southeast Asia.
A super app ecosystem flowing from e-commerce (Shopee) to payments (ShopeePay) to financial services (Monee) to entertainment (Garena).
Language, payments, logistics, and regulatory compliance optimized for each of 11 Southeast Asian markets. Strong local advantage versus Temu and Amazon.
Unified utilization of e-commerce, payments, lending, and gaming data for AI-powered personalization. Further strengthened by the Google AI partnership.

competitors.name: TikTok Shop
competitors.detail: Rapidly growing in Southeast Asian live commerce. 14.2% market share.

competitors.name: Lazada (Alibaba)
competitors.detail: #2 Southeast Asian e-commerce (16.4% share). Continuously losing ground to Shopee.

competitors.name: Temu (PDD Holdings)
competitors.detail: Ultra-low-price cross-border e-commerce in Southeast Asia and Brazil. MAU surging +55%.

competitors.name: MercadoLibre
competitors.detail: #1 Latin American e-commerce and fintech. Competes directly with Shopee in Brazil.

competitors.name: Grab Holdings
competitors.detail: Southeast Asian super app. Indirect competition with Monee in fintech.

recentNews.headline: Sea Limited expands strategic AI partnership MOU with Google
recentNews.significance: Shopee: AI agentic shopping prototype. Garena: AI-driven game development innovation. Monee: AP2 payment protocol adoption. Sea CEO Forrest Li: 'AI is the next great technological revolution.'

recentNews.headline: Q4 2025 and FY2025 earnings date announced ‚Äî March 3
recentNews.significance: Consensus Q4 2025 revenue $6.78B, EPS $0.87-$0.90. Whether FY2025E total revenue of $23.12B (+37.4% YoY) is achieved will be the key focus.

recentNews.headline: PYMNTS: Shopee and Monee armed with Google AI tools ‚Äî leading the agentic commerce era
recentNews.significance: Building AI agent-based automated payment infrastructure through AP2 (Agent Payments Protocol).

recentNews.headline: Morgan Stanley lowers SE target from $209 to $173 (maintains Overweight)
recentNews.significance: Target reduced on near-term margin pressure concerns from growth investments. However, maintains Shopee GMV 20%+ growth outlook.

recentNews.headline: BofA lowers SE target from $182 to $150 (maintains Buy)
recentNews.significance: Reflects margin pressure from Southeast Asia and Brazil expansion investments. Buy rating maintained.

analystOpinions.notableComment: 16 out of 17 analysts rate Buy. Morgan Stanley Overweight $173 (lowered), BofA Buy $150 (lowered), Barclays Buy $226 (street high), Deutsche Bank Strong Buy $170. Price targets are trending lower but Buy ratings are being maintained. Q4 earnings on 3/3 could catalyze a rerating.

risks.title: Intensifying e-commerce competition from TikTok Shop and Temu
risks.description: TikTok Shop is rapidly growing in Southeast Asian live commerce (14.2% market share). Temu is surging with an ultra-low-price strategy, MAU +55%.

risks.title: Shopee profitability vs. growth tradeoff
risks.description: Morgan Stanley and BofA target reductions reflect margin pressure concerns from growth investments. A return to subsidy wars is possible if competition intensifies further.

risks.title: Single-game dependency on Free Fire
risks.description: Garena revenue is overwhelmingly concentrated in Free Fire. IP collaborations drove a near-term rebound, but the gaming segment could decline again without new titles.

risks.title: Technical weakness ‚Äî trading below key moving averages
risks.description: Currently at $108.67, below both the 50-day SMA ($122) and 200-day SMA ($153). Down 45% from the 52-week high of $199.30.

risks.title: Monee credit quality and regulatory risk
risks.description: Rapid loan book expansion to $7.9B (+70% YoY) raises potential credit deterioration concerns. 90-day NPL at 1.1% is stable but could spike in a downturn.

buyReasons.title: Deeply undervalued ‚Äî 67% upside to consensus
buyReasons.rationale: At $108.67, the average analyst target of $181 implies 66.6% upside. Forward P/E of 27x with PEG of 0.45. 16 out of 17 analysts rate Buy.

buyReasons.title: Profitability turnaround accelerating ‚Äî FCF $3.9B, net cash $5.7B, $1B buyback
buyReasons.rationale: TTM operating margin 8.2%, FCF $3.9B (18.5% margin), net cash $5.66B. $1B share buyback program underway. Net income $1.42B (+1,358% YoY).

buyReasons.title: Google AI partnership + super app ecosystem synergies
buyReasons.rationale: MOU signed with Google on 2/19 for simultaneous innovation in e-commerce, gaming, and AI payments. Structural beneficiary of Southeast Asian digital economy (e-commerce TAM $230B, fintech TAM $200B+).

buyReasons.title: Q4 2025 earnings (3/3) as catalyst ‚Äî earnings surprise potential
buyReasons.rationale: On a trend of consecutive earnings improvements, meeting or beating Q4 revenue consensus of $6.78B could trigger a sharp rebound. Significant pessimism is already priced in.

overallOpinion: Delivering simultaneous 38% high growth + profitability turnaround (operating margin 8.2%, FCF $3.9B, net income +1,358% YoY)
45% discount from 52-week high, 67% upside to consensus, PEG 0.45 ‚Äî a clear undervaluation zone
Google AI partnership + Monee fintech +61% + $1B buyback provide durable structural growth drivers
Intensifying competition from TikTok Shop and Temu plus simultaneous breaks below 50-day and 200-day SMAs pose near-term risks
Q4 2025 earnings on 3/3 is the key catalyst for rerating ‚Äî a dollar-cost averaging approach is warranted

sources.description: Analyst consensus target and Buy distribution
